member.name: T:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest
member.summary: Test class for the spreadsheet engine, testing various functionalities

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.ExpressionEvaluationTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet class and it's underlying engine to evaluate an expression correctly, using operators: +, -, *, and parentheses

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.DependancyTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet class and it's underlying engine to evaluate an expression that depends on the value of another cell

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.MultipleDependancyTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet class and it's underlying engine to evaluate an expression depending on multiple different cells

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.DependancyUpdateTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet class and it's underlying engine to update the value of a cell when a different cell that it is dependant on has its value changed

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.CellTextChangedTest
member.summary: Creates a test Sheet class, and uses the GetCell() method to test whether ChangeText() worked correctly.

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.UndoTextTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet and it's underlying logic to undo changed text

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.UndoColortest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet and it's underlying logic to undo changed BG color

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.RedoTextTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet and it's underlying logic to undo changed text

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.RedoColorTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet and it's underlying logic to undo changed BG color

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.SaveLoadTest
member.summary: Tests the XML Saving and loading functionality of the spreadsheet NOTE: filename is local to this machine, a new file will have to be created if this program is transferred Can use the normal interface to do this ^^

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.InvalidReferenceTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet to detect an invalid reference and change the value of the cell to an error message

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.OutOfBoundsTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet to detect an out of bouds reference and change the value of the cell to an error message

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.SelfReferenceTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet to detect a self reference and change the value of the cell to an error message

member.name: M:CptS321.SpreadsheetEngineTest.CircularReferenceTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of the spreadsheet to detect a circular reference and change the value of the cell to an error message
